text: 1. 4/4/2025 | S | Recommitted to WAM.
2. 4/4/2025 | S | Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1742) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.

3. 4/1/2025 | S | The committee(s) on  WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Lee, C., Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Kim ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) DeCoite, Wakai.
4. 3/28/2025 | S | The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 04-01-25 10:00AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
5. 3/25/2025 | S | The committee(s) on WAM has scheduled a public hearing on 03-28-25 10:00AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
6. 3/6/2025 | S | Referred to WAM.
7. 3/6/2025 | S | Passed First Reading.
8. 3/6/2025 | S | Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 246).

9. 3/4/2025 | H | Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Kila, Lamosao, Miyake voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Alcos, Amato, Garcia, Kong, Matsumoto, Muraoka, Reyes Oda, Shimizu, Souza voting no (9) and Representative(s) Pierick, Ward excused (2).  Transmitted to Senate.
10. 2/28/2025 | H | Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday,  03-04-25.
11. 2/28/2025 | H | Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1166) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.

12. 2/24/2025 | H | The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Holt, Hussey, Kitagawa, Kusch, Lee, M., Morikawa, Templo; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Lamosao, Miyake; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Alcos, Reyes Oda; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ward.
13. 2/21/2025 | H | Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Monday, 02-24-25 10:00AM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

14. 2/12/2025 | H | Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) Amato voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Alcos, Garcia, Kong, Matsumoto, Muraoka, Pierick, Reyes Oda, Shimizu voting no (8) and Representative(s) Cochran, Sayama, Ward excused (3).
15. 2/12/2025 | H | Reported from ECD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 498) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

16. 1/29/2025 | H | The committee on ECD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Ilagan, Hussey, Holt, Tam, Templo, Todd; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Matsumoto;  Noes: none; and  Excused: none.
17. 1/23/2025 | H | Bill scheduled to be heard by ECD on Wednesday, 01-29-25 10:00AM in House conference room 423 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
18. 1/21/2025 | H | Referred to ECD, FIN, referral sheet 2
19. 1/21/2025 | H | Introduced and Pass First Reading.
20. 1/17/2025 | H | Pending introduction.
